entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

RAIN LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
